# Loan Approvals

Datasets

- loan_approval.csv - https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/supratimnag06/loan-approval-prediction-dataset - ✅	
- bank_loan_data.csv - https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/udaymalviya/bank-loan-data - is not approvals - ❌
- loan_approval_dataset.csv - https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/suryadeepthi/loan-approval-dataset - does not have loan approval status - ❌
- loan_approval_class.csv - https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/taweilo/loan-approval-classification-data - same as bank loan data - ❌
- loan_data.csv - https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/prateekmaj21/loan-approvals - ✅	

NOTE: bank_loan_data.csv and loan_approval_class.csv are the same data.
